title: Star Tunes
shortDesc: A music streaming application allows users to access a vast library of music content and favorite songs online, without the need to download or own music files.
desc: Star Tunes streaming application, built using React with SCSS, utilizes the Spotify API to fetch music data. The application incorporates Spotify authorization, allowing users to securely authenticate and access their Spotify accounts. Users can explore music, play songs, discover new albums, and create their own playlists, leveraging the features provided by the Spotify platform.

title: Prayer Times
shortDesc: Prayer Times app provides accurate prayer schedules and reminders to help Muslims effectively manage their daily prayers.
desc: Prayer Times app, built with React, offers precise prayer schedules for cities in Bosnia and Herzegovina, utilizing data from the official API of the Islamic Community of Bosnia and Herzegovina (Rijaset Islamske zajednice u Bosni i Hercegovini). User is able to browse prayer times for every city in Bosnia and Herzegovina

title: Todo List
shortDesc: Todo list is a simple and intuitive task management tool that helps users efficiently organize and track their daily tasks and activities.
desc: The Todo List is my very first project utilizing the React library. It is a CRUD application developed with React, Spring Boot, and MySQL database, enabling users to create new tasks, edit existing ones, and delete any task from the list. REMINDER: Live Demo doesn't save data because the database is not deployed

title: REST Countries
shortDesc: REST Countries gives you info about countries all around the globe. Explore every continent and meet countries you didn't even know existed
desc: REST Countries is one of the very first projects I've done using Vue3. REST Countries API was used to pull country info and display it to end-user. User is able to see all countries from the API on homepage, search for specific country by using input field, filter countries by region, see more details about every country by clicking on it.

title: TravelPal
shortDesc: You love to travel? TravelPal is way to go then. TravelPal is the place where you can find your new pal to travel with or host for your next vacation
desc: TravelPal is my college project, which is still in progress, where I need to create and design a concept for a web app. After that, I have to create full-stack app that I previously designed. Currently, I completed desktop version design and few pages for mobile version. Generally, TravelPal is application for travel community. TravelPal helps user to meet new people by traveling together. User can find host for his next travel too. TravelPal contains feed also, where users can share their experience from vacation.

title: praksa.ba
shortDesc: praksa.ba can help you find your first internship in an IT company in Bosnia and Herzegovina. We maintain a database of currently available internships.
desc: Praksa.ba is a CRUD application I created for learning purposes. I used .NET MAUI as the primary technology and focused on developing for the Android platform. MongoDB and ExpressJS was used to provide APIs for application. Users can register as either a company or a student. Students can search for open internships and preview them, while companies can add, edit, or delete internships. Both roles have their own profile pages which they can edit.

title: Rock Paper Scissors
shortDesc: Rock Paper Scissors is a game played to settle disputes between two people. Thought to be a game of chance that depends on random luck similar to flipping coins
desc: Rock paper scissors is a simple game I created using Vue3. Users can test their luck by playing game against computer. Users are able to view optimal layout for the game on their device's screen size. Their score is counted after every played round.
